content:
@Lloyd McKenzie could you please reply to the comment from @Hans Buitendijk on tracker #20704?
https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=20704&start=0
InM would appreciate your input before making a decision.
I've added my thoughts. @Grahame Grieve, you should add yours
I don't have anything to add yet

I've added my thoughts. Grahame Grieve, you should add yours

@Hans Buitendijk would you like to argue the point or should we close the tracker?

@Hans Buitendijk @Lloyd McKenzie InM is discussing tracker 20704 to add a MessageHeader.identifier. Would appreciate your input before we vote. https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=20704
We decided to table that one for now. It seems there are some related inconsistencies in section 3.4.1.4: http://build.fhir.org/messaging.html#3.4.1.4
